texto: vocabulary 3 Terms and definitions For the purposes of this document, the terms and definitions given in ISO 9000 and the following apply. Some of the definitions below are quoted directly from ISO 9000, but notes are in some cases omitted or supplemented. 3.1 objective evidence data supporting the existence or verity of something NOTE Objective evidence may be obtained through observation, measurement, test, or other means. [ISO 9000:2000, definition 3.8.1] 3.2 procedure specified way to carry out an activity or a process (3.3) NOTE 1 Procedures can be documented or not. NOTE 2 When a procedure is documented, the term “written procedure” or “documented procedure” is frequently used. The
